name: Farm It: Funky DLC
summary: Change your farmer's style with classy and funky clothes! This DLC offers a delightful range of new customization options to freshen up your look and transform your living space. With this expansion, you'll unlock 9 crazy hats and 9 stylish sets of clothes to mix and match, allowing you to express your personal flair. Additionally, you'll gain access to 128 awesome decorations that you can use to make your house truly unique. And to top it off, you'll receive 6000 coins to purchase everything you need to achieve your desired style and decor. Have fun exploring these new possibilities and updating your farmer's appearance and home environment!
